Cytochrome c oxidase deficiency is frequently fatal in childhood, although some individuals with mild signs and symptoms survive into adolescence or adulthood.",GHR,cytochrome c oxidase deficiency
How many people are affected by cytochrome c oxidase deficiency ?,"In Eastern Europe, cytochrome c oxidase deficiency is estimated to occur in 1 in 35,000 individuals. The prevalence of this condition outside this region is unknown.",GHR,cytochrome c oxidase deficiency
